interaction.cooldown: Please wait for cooldown to run out
interaction.err: There was an error while executing this command!

selectLang.desc: Click here below to change your preferred language
selectLang.field1: Warning: Only the Embed messages of this channel will change language.
selectLang.field2: To ensure that this happens in other Channels too, please deactivate and reactivate the plugins or change the default channel to let the bot resend these Embeds messages.

chooseRole.desc1: This will send a Embed Message to your selected channel
chooseRole.desc2: Is useful for giving automatic roles to members

zones.desc1: Click here below for create new Zones
zones.desc2: Enabling one of them will create a new category with many Channels, which will be automatically deleted when disabled

plugins.desc1: Click here below to enable plugins : a new channel will be created below where you can set up the plugin
plugins.desc2: Warning : Do not delete those channels,disabling a plugin will automatically delete them

twitchPlugin.createTwitchZoneField1: Click here to create a Twitch zone:
twitchPlugin.createTwitchZoneField2: There you will be able to add streamers to the notification.

embed.addStreamerdesc1: Click here to add a streamer to your notifications
embed.addStreamerdesc2: You will receive a notification when streamer goes live in your selected Channel
embed.selectChanneldesc2: This will be used to send notification when a streamer goes live

replies.alreadyAdded: Streamer already added to notification list
replies.notListed: Streamer not found in your notification list,retry
replies.foundDelete: Streamer found and deleted from notification list

autorolePlugin.AutoRoleDesc2: This will be added automatically when members join

welcomerPlugin.text: Welcomer text has been set to

embeds.chooseChannelDesc1: Please select a text channel: this will be used by the welcomer to send messages when members join
embeds.changeTextDesc: Click here to change the text
embeds.chooseBackgroundDesc2: this will be applied to the Welcomer's messages

leaverPlugin.text: Leaver text has been set to :
leaverPlugin.changeText: Click here to change the text

playerPlugin.desc1: Please select a text channel: this will be used by the music player to send messages (Tip: Select #player-room if previously created)
playerPlugin.desc2: Warning: It will be sent an Embed Message with buttons:those will avoid using text commands

buttons.search: ðŸ”Ž Enter your link or song's title here!

modal.title: Search your song!
modal.label: Please enter songs link or title here
modal.placeholder: Paste link or song's title here

commands.join: Player has joined your voice Channel
commands.leave: Player has left the voice channel

errors.repeatMode: Please provide an available loop mode: DISABLED = 0, SONG = 1 , QUEUE = 2
errors.memberJoin: Please join a voice channel first to be able to use these buttons.
errors.skip: You are not an administrator,${memberLeft} more members or an administrator have to click the next button to skip the current song.

ticketZone.createTicketZoneField1: Click here to create a new ticket:
ticketZone.createTicketZoneField2: This can be used by members to report any issue to admins.
ticketZone.startEmbedField1: Use button below for close this ticket
ticketZone.startEmbedField2: This channel will be then deleted in 5 seconds

commands.falseReportdesc:
You have been warned in ${interaction.guild.name} for a false report! This is your ${warnCount}th warn. Be careful with report commands. If you continue to break the server's rules, the admin could take more severe actions against you. 
 ***If you think this was wrong warn please contact an admin!***

reportEmbed.desc: Welcome to the reports channel. Only admins will be able to view this channel.
reportEmbed.field1: You will be able to pick an option from the menu below every report.
reportEmbed.field2:
Options will be : 
 -`Warn` 
 -`Kick` 
 -`Ban` 
 -`Ignore` 
 -`Report reporter` (this will warn the user who reported)

resolved.desc:
Status : Resolved 
 This situation has been dealth with

warn.desc: Welcome to the warn channel. Only admins will be able to view this channel.
warn.field1: Here you will be able to see when an admin will warn a user,
warn.field2: This is useful for checking many things like how many times was a user warned or who warned him

adminZone.createAdminZoneField1: Click here for creating the Admin Zone:
adminZone.createAdminZoneField2: this will be used by admin for getting logs,reports and warn count

start.desc:
Thanks for adding me to your discord. 
 Please, follow this tutorial to get my best setup.
 It won't take long.
start.field1: Warning: If the tutorial is skipped or not configured correctly, my correct function is not guaranteed...
start.field2: Please click the button below to continue

selectLang.desc: Thanks for starting the tutorial. Let's start choosing a language
selectLang.field1: This will be used for this tutorial as well in your discord
selectLang.field2: Tips: You will be able to change it later in #botsettings channel

part1.field1: Do you want to have a section regarding your server statistics?
part1.field2: (Members, Online and Offline channels will be created)

part2.field1: Do you want to have a section to welcome new members and let them choose a role for themselves?
part2.field2: (Welcome and choose-roles channels will be created)

part3.field1: Do you want to have a section for giving commands to the music player and listening to music?
part3.field2: (Player-room and music channels will be created)

part4.field1: Do you want to activate the welcomer?
part4.field2: Welcome messages will be send when new members will join

part5.field1: Please select a text channel: this will be used by the music player to send messages (Tip: Select player-room if previously created)
part5.field2: Warning: It will be sent an Embed Message with buttons: those will avoid using text commands

part6.field1: Do you want me to auto-assign a role for new members?
part6.field2: You will be able to select it in the channel that will be created below

end.desc:
Everything set up. 
 Below you will find other text channels where you can set me up in the future. This channel will be deleted after clicking on the button below
end.field1: Tip: Use the / for a complete list of all usable commands, otherwise use /help to get a list with all categories
end.field2: Warning: Do not delete the channels below, you will need them later to change bot settings

moderation.optLeaveDs: I'm sorryðŸ˜¢, admins want me to drop this discord! GoodbyeðŸ˜‹
moderation.optWarn:
You have been warned in ${interaction.guild.name}. This is your ${warnCount}th warn. Be careful what you say or do on this server. If you continue to break the server's rules, the admin could take more severe actions against you. 
 ***If you think this was wrong warn please contact an admin!***

errors.hasAlreadyAdded: This role was already added to this member
errors.hasAlreadyRemoved: This role was removed to this member

help.desc: Please choose one of these categories

poll.optPollDeny: You have already choosed one option

canvas.descLeave: <@${member.user.id}> leaved. We now have ${member.guild.memberCount} members left!

errors.noTextWelcomer: Please select a text to have inside your Welcomer message in #welcomer-plugin
errors.noTextLeaver: Please select a text to have inside your Leaver message in #welcomer-plugin
errors.noBackground: Please select a background for your Welcomer/Leaver message in #welcomer-plugin

chooseRole.title: Add Role
chooseRole.desc: Click on a button to get yourself a role
